
add_executable(chroot chroot.c)

if(PROGRAM_PREFIX)

endif()

IF(MAN8_FILES)
    INSTALL(FILES ${MAN8_FILES} DESTINATION ${CMAKE_INSTALL_MANDIR}/man8 COMPONENT ManPages)
ENDIF()
